articles.content:
A global helium shortage has doctors worried about one of the natural gass most essential, and perhaps unexpected, uses: MRIs.
Strange as it sounds, the lighter-than-air element that gives balloons … [+6434 chars]

articles.title: Here's what's really hurting the economy - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: We’re living in a world where supply shortages are commonplace and impacting the economy to a degree we haven’t seen for decades.
articles.content:
I went out for pizza the other night, but had to eat it in my car.
Thats because the Frank Pepes in Manchester, Connecticut had this sign on its door.
